data.shipping_country: =_('data.workato_service.2a9400f9.request.apnData.first.shippingCountry').present? ? skip : " In the Account, the `Shipping Country` field cannot be blank\n"
data.shipping_state: =(_('data.workato_service.2a9400f9.request.apnData.first.shippingCountry') == "United States" and _('data.workato_service.2a9400f9.request.apnData.first.shippingState').blank? == true) ? " In the Account, the `Shipping State` field cannot be blank for accounts in the United States\n" : skip
data.postal_code: =_('data.workato_service.2a9400f9.request.apnData.first.postalCode').present? ? skip : " In the Account, the `Shipping Zip/Postal Code` cannot be blank\n"
data.website: =_('data.workato_service.2a9400f9.request.apnData.first.website').present? ? skip : " In the Account, the `Website` field cannot be blank\n"
data.industry: =_('data.workato_service.2a9400f9.request.apnData.first.industry').present? ? skip : " In the Account, the `Rapid7 Industry` field cannot be blank\n"

conditions.lhs:
=_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.close_date').present? or _('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.industry').present? or _('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.shipping_country').present? or _('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.shipping_state').present? or
_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.postal_code').present? or
_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.website').present? or 
_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.opp_stage').present?

input.PublishingFailureReason__c:
We can't send your opp to AWS until you update the following information:
#{_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.close_date')}#{_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.industry')}#{_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.shipping_country')}#{_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.shipping_state')}#{_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.postal_code')}#{_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.website')}#{_('data.workato_list.04ca67bb.list_items.first.opp_stage')}

Once the errors above have been corrected, your opp will be automatically submitted to AWS.
